title: Audit trail
description: The audit trail schema indicates a data record is auditable. For example, who and when the record was last modified.

xdm:parentId.title: Parent ID
xdm:parentId.description: ID of the parent for the content being featurized.

xdm:stringValue.title: String Value
xdm:stringValue.description: String value of the featurized attribute.

xdm:numberValue.title: Number Value
xdm:numberValue.description: Number value of the featurized attribute.
